item.title: Web Component Icons
item.description: This is the story of <pfe-icon>, an SVG-based icon Web Component I’ve been working on for the PatternFly Elements project. Before the rambling begins, let’s have a demo! .icon-panel { width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr); justify-items: center; } Features On-demand icon loading No CORS restrictions Icon coloring Concise syntax Icon sets Here’s how pfe-icon works, starting with the custom HTML tag, and walking through
